name: Ssss Expressions
description:
Sssss! Sssss ss sssss ss-sss? Sssss sss.

"Snakes! Do they feel love like we do? Now you can find out."

What?

Ssss-Expressions is a game about snakes, no nonsense, honest to goodness snakes.

... and love.

How?

It is written in Clojure using a framework called quip I've been writing for game jams based on the Quil library. The music and art assets were all created during the jam.

Who?

Game and art by Kimbsy, music by PJ Kimber.

Source code is available on github.

Playtesting feedback:

> "Surprisingly moving"

> "Oh boy, I know that feel"

> "I wasn't ready to connect on an emotional level"
